official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to grant survivors of Reserves who retire for nonregular service and die before becoming entitled to retired pay eligibility for certain survivor benefits.

summary.text: Reserve Survivors' Benefits Act of 1979 - Title I: Annuities Under Survivor Survivor Benefit Plan - Grants annuities to the survivors of individuals who would have been eligible for retired military pay for non-regular service but who died before reaching the age of 60. Establishes formulae for computing such benefits. Title II: Medical and Dental Care - Entitles such survivors to specified medical and dental benefits.
